The Strategy focuses on investing in high-quality companies with favorable cashflow-based valuations. headline: HCA Healthcare Names Erica Rossitto as Chief Nurse Executive
summary: NASHVILLE, Tenn., January 15, 2026--HCA Healthcare, Inc. (NYSE:HCA), one of the nation’s leading healthcare providers, today announced that Erica Rossitto, MBA/HCM, BSN, RN, NEA-BC, has been promoted to senior vice president and chief nurse executive, effective February 1, 2026. In this role, Rossitto will lead the nursing agenda in advancing the practice of nursing among HCA Healthcare’s more than 100,000 nurses.
